title: Queer Eye’s Antoni Porowski hates single life as he’s ‘terrified’ of being alone
text:
Queer Eye’s Antoni Porowski hates single life (Picture: Getty Images)

Queer Eye’s Antoni Porowski has admitted to hating single life after recently splitting from his boyfriend Trace Lehnhoff.

The duo went public with their relationship in September last year, however, decided to call it a day in the summer.

But it sounds as though the famous chef is not taking too well to single life, as he confessed he is ‘terrified of being alone’.

When chatting to Jessie Ware on her podcast Table Manners, the 35-year-old opened up on his current situation.

He told the singer: ‘I am somebody who is pathologically co-dependent.

He said he is terrified of being alone (Picture: Getty Images)

‘I’ve always lost myself in relationships, that’s just the person I am, I kind of tend to lose my identity and I have abandonment issues so I really try to make sure the person loves me and never leaves me.’

Admitting that he is trying to learn to be independent, he went onto explain how being surrounded by people all the time makes him afraid of going back to an empty house.

‘You are in these crazy environments and at the end of the day, you’re kind of left by yourself,’ he said: ‘And that is a terrifying thing for me because I love people but I am terrified of being by myself.’

Antoni confirmed he was single after insiders claimed that the ‘relationship had run its course’.

It was rumoured he was dating Jonathan Van Ness but has denied the claims (Picture: Getty Images)

He told People: ‘I’m single now and it’s been a good opportunity to connect with friends. Being able to be free and have fun with friends is the ultimate luxury these days.’

The news came after the star had alluded to a budding romance with his Queer Eye cast-mate Jonathan Van Ness.

However, after posting up a number of cosy snaps on Instagram, the pair denied anything was going on.

And our hearts dropped for a moment.

The hairstylist told his followers: ‘It was all Antoni’s idea, but maybe someday we will fall in love @antoni #notacouplebutitwasfunright.’

It sure was!
